FuncDef: The display ppp mp command displays information and traffic statistics about an MP-group interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Examples: Bundle Multilink, 2 member, slot 1, Master link is Mp-group1/0/1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information and traffic statistics about an MP-group interface, run the display ppp mp command. The command output helps you locate interface faults.
Prerequisites
PPP serial interfaces have been restarted after being added to the MP-group interfaces on both ends.
